LanguageData.VFEE_PipeOrgans.label: Órgano
LanguageData.VFEE_PipeOrgans.description: Crear un órgano de tubos, un instrumento musical increíblemente avanzado e intrincado.
LanguageData.VFEE_PipeOrgans.generalRules.rulesString: subject_story->crafted instruments that echoed through cathedrals and concert halls alike
subject_story->combined ancient lore with modern acoustics to create a symphony of sound
subject_story->invented an organ with pipes that mimicked the voice of the divine
LanguageData.VFEE_NobleDecorations.label: decoración de la nobleza
LanguageData.VFEE_NobleDecorations.description: Construir decoraciones perteneciente a la nobleza, como alfombras reales, espejos, grandes sillones, losa imperial, candelabros y más.
LanguageData.VFEE_NobleDecorations.generalRules.rules: subject_story->designed living spaces fit for kings and queens
subject_story->brought beauty and luxury to the stark lives of the nobility
subject_story->set the standards for opulence in decor that lasted centuries
LanguageData.VFEE_StellicThrone.label: trono estelar
LanguageData.VFEE_StellicThrone.description: Construir el trono estelar más grandioso y bello disponible para la nobleza de mayor rango posible.
LanguageData.VFEE_StellicThrone.generalRules.rulesStr: subject_story->forged a throne from the heart of a fallen star, symbolizing eternal rule
subject_story->crafted not just a seat, but a legacy, ensuring the ruler's presence is felt even in absence
subject_story->merged the art of smithing with celestial materials to create a throne worthy of legends
subject_gerund->creating the pinnacle of nobility's power
LanguageData.VFEE_JanissaryGear.label: equipo de jenízaro
LanguageData.VFEE_JanissaryGear.description: Crear la armadura de jenízaro, una armadura ligera que suele ser usada por las tropas de reconocimiento imperial. Estas armaduras requiere componentes avanzados.
LanguageData.VFEE_JanissaryGear.generalRules.rulesStr: subject_story->designed armor that blended ancient warrior traditions with the pinnacle of modern defense technology
subject_story->equipped scouts with gear that turned the tide of covert operations
subject_story->created a legacy of warriors feared for both their prowess and their unparalleled equipment
subject_gerund->forging the future of military attire
